attributes.action: Improve the choice of candidates that people can vote for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone should be able to choose from any candidate on a national list, including local ones. The person with the most votes would be Prime Minister and the 650 candidates with the most votes could attend parliament.

Represenatives' income & power to vote in parliament would be in direct proportion to the number of people that voted for them.

Voters can switch their representative, and therefore alter the representatives' income & power in parliament, at any time if they lose trust in them. 

Upgrade democracy to version 2.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
